dct_description_sm: relative a un memoire de Mr. Guettard ; J. Ingram sculp.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "d'un Lieue et demie de Beauce de 1700 la Lieue."
Includes legend indicating mineral resources: Explication des caracteres.
"Mem. de l'Ac. R. des sc. 1753. Pag. 192. Pl. 8" at top right margin.
